entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
